narrative:
This is a focused inspection to address the Direct non-compliant item listed under 2.40 (b)(2) on the May 12, 2016
inspection report. The adult, male Maltese identified by microchip (#029-099-848) received veterinary care on May
12, 2016. 
This non-compliant item has been corrected. 
 
Exit briefing conducted with the licensee and facility representative.
